title: july 24: a global warming update
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about some new information discovered about climate change in 2019. After, she reflects on the surprise release of folklore. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
